frame.name: Bounded_entity
frame.definition: <def-root>This is an abstract frame for bounded areas, used mostly for FE inheritance.</def-root>

FE.name: Bounded_area
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a stable <fen>Bounded_area</fen>. It typically serves as the denotation of nouns.</def-root>

FE.name: Constituent_parts
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the salient <fen>Constituent_parts</fen> that make up a bounded area.</def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Relative_location</fen> identifies the place in respect to which a bounded area is located.</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is used for the <fen>Name</fen> of a bounded area.</def-root>

FE.name: Owner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Owner</fen>, generally a person, of the bounded area.</def-root >

FE.name: Formational_cause
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Formational_cause</fen> (action or agent) that brings about the features of the bounded area.</def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>An indication of which kind of <fen>Bounded_area</fen> the entity is.</def-root>
